answers.answer: Is this an actual fever that you measure with a thermometer?

Yes the fever ranges from 99.1 to 101.7. the onset is approx 1 hr post work out. The aches feel like Ii am coming down with the flu.I am 53, obese with Type II diabetes and have commensed walking so far I am doing 2 miles every other day in preparation for a walk race in NYC of 1.7miles.

question: Need to know medical reason for expericing a fever and flu like acky body after exercising
title: Flu like symptoms post work-out
